firstNightReminder: The Reserve Student points to a player. If that player is the Mastermind: swap the Mastermind and Reserve Student character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Reserve Student is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Reserve Student points to a player. If that player is the Mastermind: swap the Mastermind and Reserve Student character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Reserve Student is poisoned.
name: Reserve Student
ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Mastermind swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

firstNightReminder: The Photographer either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Photographer chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
otherNightReminder: If the Photographer has not yet used their ability: the Photographer either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Photographer chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
name: Photographer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Mastermind voted today. Place the 'Mastermind no vote' marker (remove 'Mastermind vote', if any).
name: Yakuza
ability: Each night*, you learn if a Mastermind voted today.

otherNightReminder: If the Musician was killed by a Mastermind: Point to two players, one of which is that Mastermind.
name: Musician
ability: If the Mastermind kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

name: Gamer
ability: Each day, you may visit Monokuma to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

name: Princess
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask Monokuma any yes/no question.

firstNightReminder: The Team Manager points to a player. Show 1 hope and 1 despair character token; one of these is correct.
otherNightReminder: The Team Manager points to a player. Show 1 hope and 1 despair character token; one of these is correct.
name: Team Manager
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 hope and 1 despair character, 1 of which is correct.

otherNightReminder: If today was the Gymnast’s first day: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.
name: Gymnast
ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Traitor nominated today. Place the 'Traitor no nominate' marker (remove 'Traitor nominate', if any).
name: Swordswoman
ability: Each night*, you learn if a Traitor nominated today.

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (1, 2, 3, etc.) of places from the Mastermind to closest Traitor.
name: Mechanic
ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Mastermind to its nearest Traitor.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of dead evil players.
name: Breeder
ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are despair.

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
name: Nurse
ability: Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

firstNightReminder: The Imposter either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a hope character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Imposter token. Or, if the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player and the Not the Imposter token by the Imposter.
otherNightReminder: If the Imposter has not used their ability: the Imposter either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a hope character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Imposter token. Or, if the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player and the Not the Imposter token by the Imposter.
name: Imposter
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a hope character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are an Imitation.

name: Chef
ability: If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

name: Lucky Student
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are despair, your team loses.

name: Monomi
otherNightReminder: Choose a player that is an Imitation.
ability: When you die, 1 player is an Imitation from now on.

name: Dancer
otherNightReminder: If the Dancer died today: Wake the Mastermind. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Dancer token. The Mastermind either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Mastermind may choose 2 players (not another Mastermind) to swap characters.

name: Founder
otherNightReminder: The Founder points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.
ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Mastermind is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

name: Monobeast
firstNightReminder: The Monobeast points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
otherNightReminder: If there are 4 or more players alive: The Monobeast points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

name: Animator
firstNightReminder: The Animator points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Animator token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
otherNightReminder: The Animator points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Animator token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are “mad” they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

name: Remnant
firstNightReminder: Wake the Remnant and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Remnant. Show their Remnant token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Remnant player.
ability: You & an opposing player know each other and are twins. If the hope player is executed, despair wins. Hope can't win if you both live.

otherNightReminder: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.
name: Ultimate Despair
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Classmate abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, despair wins.

otherNightReminder: The Director points to a player. That player dies.
name: Director
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Classmate neighbours are poisoned.

otherNightReminder: The Talent points to a player. That player dies. If a Traitor, they keep their ability and one of their Classmate neighbours is poisoned.
name: Talent
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Traitors you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Classmate neighbour. [−1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Virus points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Virus in play: The Virus dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Virus. Wake the new Virus. Show the 'You are' card, then the Virus token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.
name: Virus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Virus & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
